description.value: You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself. Whenever you critically hit using a @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Composite Shortbow]{Composite Shortbow}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Glaive]{Glaive}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Longspear]{Longspear}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Longsword]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Shortbow]{Shortbow}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Spear]{Spear}, or a conrasu weapon(@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Buugeng]{Buugeng}), you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.
